birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国社会活动家及政治犯，中国民主运动的标志性人物之一。因在北京西单民主墙发表《第五个现代化》等文章，批评独裁并倡导民主，被长期监禁。1997年流亡美国，担任中国民主运动海外联席会议主席和魏京生基金会主席。
description.en: A Chinese social activist and political prisoner, one of the iconic figures of the Chinese democracy movement. He was imprisoned for a long period for publishing essays such as 'The Fifth Modernization' on the Xidan Democracy Wall in Beijing, criticizing dictatorship and advocating for democracy. He went into exile in the United States in 1997 and serves as the chairman of the Overseas Chinese Democracy Coalition and the Wei Jingsheng Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲的一个主权国家。其政府曾长期监禁并最终流放了社会活动家魏京生。
description.en: A sovereign state in Asia. Its government imprisoned and eventually exiled social activist Wei Jingsheng for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，魏京生的出生地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China and the birthplace of Wei Jingsheng.

description.zh-cn: 1978年至1979年间发生于中国北京的一场短暂的政治自由化运动，魏京生是其中的重要参与者。
description.en: A brief political liberalization movement that took place in Beijing, China, from 1978 to 1979, in which Wei Jingsheng was a key participant.

zh-cn: 第五个现代化：民主及其他

description.zh-cn: 魏京生于1978年在西单民主墙上张贴的大字报，主张中国除了四个现代化外，还需要政治民主化。
description.en: A big-character poster put up by Wei Jingsheng on the Xidan Democracy Wall in 1978, arguing that China needed political democratization in addition to the Four Modernizations.

nodes.id: 要民主还是要新的独裁

zh-cn: 要民主还是要新的独裁

description.zh-cn: 魏京生于1979年张贴的大字报，其中直接批评邓小平为独裁者。
description.en: A big-character poster put up by Wei Jingsheng in 1979, in which he directly criticized Deng Xiaoping as a dictator.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。被魏京生在其大字报《要民主还是要新的独裁》中批评为独裁者。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Chinese Communist Party. He was criticized as a dictator by Wei Jingsheng in his big-character poster 'Democracy or New Dictatorship'.

description.zh-cn: 魏京生之父，曾在中国人民解放军总后勤部任职。
description.en: Father of Wei Jingsheng, who served in the General Logistics Department of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部
en: General Logistics Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的后勤保障部门，魏京生之父魏梓林曾在此任职。
description.en: The logistics support department of the People's Liberation Army, where Wei Jingsheng's father, Wei Zilin, once served.

nodes.id: 中国人民大学附属中学

zh-cn: 中国人民大学附属中学
en: The High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的一所著名中学，魏京生曾在此就读。
description.en: A renowned high school in Beijing, China, where Wei Jingsheng was a student.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。魏京生在此期间曾作为红卫兵参与其中。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong. Wei Jingsheng participated in it as a Red Guard during this period.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期的青年学生组织，魏京生曾是其中一员。
description.en: Youth student organizations during the Cultural Revolution, of which Wei Jingsheng was a member.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，四人帮成员之一。魏京生在文革期间开始对她产生怀疑。
description.en: Mao Zedong's fourth wife and a member of the Gang of Four. Wei Jingsheng began to have doubts about her during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。魏京生在看到大跃进的后果后，认为毛泽东是“刽子手”。
description.en: The principal founder of the People's Republic of China. After seeing the consequences of the Great Leap Forward, Wei Jingsheng considered Mao Zedong a 'butcher'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一场经济和社会运动，导致了大饥荒。魏京生目睹其后果后，对毛泽东产生了极度负面的看法。
description.en: An economic and social campaign in the People's Republic of China that led to a great famine. After witnessing its consequences, Wei Jingsheng developed an extremely negative view of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 魏京生等人在西单民主墙时期创办的民运杂志。
description.en: A pro-democracy magazine founded by Wei Jingsheng and others during the Xidan Democracy Wall period.

description.zh-cn: 中国民运人士，魏京生的朋友。因偷录并发表魏京生的法庭陈词而被捕。
description.en: A Chinese democracy activist and a friend of Wei Jingsheng. He was arrested for secretly recording and publishing Wei's court statement.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院助理国务卿，曾于1994年2月在北京与魏京生会面。
description.en: U.S. Assistant Secretary of State who met with Wei Jingsheng in Beijing in February 1994.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法机构，于1996年授予魏京生萨哈罗夫思想自由奖。
description.en: The legislative body of the European Union, which awarded the Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought to Wei Jingsheng in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 美国第42任总统。在中国政府为争取克林顿1998年访华而进行的人质外交操作下，魏京生得以获释流亡。
description.en: The 42nd President of the United States. Wei Jingsheng was released and exiled as part of hostage diplomacy by the Chinese government ahead of Clinton's 1998 visit to China.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一所私立研究型大学。魏京生流亡美国后，曾一度获得该校的赞助。
description.en: A private research university in the United States. After Wei Jingsheng went into exile in the U.S., he was sponsored by the university for a period.

nodes.id: 中国民主运动海外联席会议

zh-cn: 中国民主运动海外联席会议

description.zh-cn: 一个海外中国民运组织，魏京生自1998年起担任主席。
description.en: An overseas Chinese pro-democracy organization, chaired by Wei Jingsheng since 1998.

description.zh-cn: 由魏京生创立并担任主席的基金会，旨在推动中国的民主和人权。
description.en: A foundation founded and chaired by Wei Jingsheng, aiming to promote democracy and human rights in China.

description.zh-cn: 美国的非营利组织，于1998年授予魏京生和王丹民主奖。
description.en: A U.S. non-profit organization that awarded the Democracy Award to Wei Jingsheng and Wang Dan in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 八九民运学生领袖，称呼魏京生为“民主斗士”。
description.en: A student leader of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, who referred to Wei Jingsheng as a 'democracy fighter'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任民主进步党主席。魏京生于2001年访台时曾与其会晤。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party. Wei Jingsheng met with him during his visit to Taiwan in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 美国第43任总统。在出席北京奥运会前，于2008年7月在白宫会见了魏京生等五位中国异议人士。
description.en: The 43rd President of the United States. Before attending the Beijing Olympics, he met with Wei Jingsheng and four other Chinese dissidents at the White House in July 2008.

description.zh-cn: 中国人权活动家，曾与魏京生等人一同获美国总统乔治·沃克·布什接见。
description.en: A Chinese human rights activist, who, along with Wei Jingsheng and others, was received by U.S. President George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 维吾尔族人权活动家，曾与魏京生等人一同获美国总统乔治·沃克·布什接见。
description.en: A Uyghur human rights activist, who, along with Wei Jingsheng and others, was received by U.S. President George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 中国异议人士，曾与魏京生等人一同获美国总统乔治·沃克·布什接见。
description.en: A Chinese dissident, who, along with Wei Jingsheng and others, was received by U.S. President George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 华人牧师，人权活动家，曾与魏京生等人一同获美国总统乔治·沃克·布什接见。
description.en: A Chinese pastor and human rights activist, who, along with Wei Jingsheng and others, was received by U.S. President George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国众议院议长。曾与魏京生探讨访华事宜，并于2023年获颁“魏京生民主人权终身奖”。
description.en: An American politician who served as Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives. She discussed her visit to China with Wei Jingsheng and was awarded the 'Wei Jingsheng Chinese Democracy Champion Award' in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国人权活动家，2010年诺贝尔和平奖得主。魏京生曾批评诺贝尔奖授予他的决定。
description.en: A Chinese human rights activist and the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize laureate. Wei Jingsheng criticized the decision to award him the Nobel Prize.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国国务卿。在其2020年的演讲《共产中国与自由世界的未来》中提及并肯定了魏京生。
description.en: An American politician who served as U.S. Secretary of State. He mentioned and acknowledged Wei Jingsheng in his 2020 speech 'Communist China and the Free World's Future'.

description.zh-cn: 指控魏京生性侵并于2019年在美国对其提起诉讼的女性。
description.en: A woman who accused Wei Jingsheng of sexual assault and filed a lawsuit against him in the United States in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，称魏京生为“民主先锋”。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, who called Wei Jingsheng a 'pioneer of democracy'.

description.zh-cn: 时事评论员，在其文章中高度评价魏京生。
description.en: A commentator on current affairs who spoke highly of Wei Jingsheng in his articles.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的官方通讯社，曾在1979年发表文章批判魏京生。
description.en: The official state press agency of the People's Republic of China, which published an article criticizing Wei Jingsheng in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆北部的联邦共和国。魏京生支持其对乌克兰发动的战争。
description.en: A federal republic in northern Eurasia. Wei Jingsheng supports its war against Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 东欧国家。魏京生对其抵抗俄罗斯入侵的立场持批评态度。
description.en: A country in Eastern Europe. Wei Jingsheng is critical of its stance in resisting the Russian invasion.

description.zh-cn: 一项瑞典年度奖项，旨在表彰对和平、民主及人权的杰出贡献。魏京生于1994年获得该奖。
description.en: An annual Swedish prize awarded for an outstanding achievement in the spirit of Olof Palme. Wei Jingsheng received this prize in 1994.

en: Robert F. Kennedy Human Rights Award

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在表彰为人权事业做出贡献的个人或团体的人权奖项。魏京生于1994年获得该奖。
description.en: A human rights award to recognize individuals or groups for their contributions to the human rights cause. Wei Jingsheng received this prize in 1994.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后勤部
中国人民大学附属中学

description.zh-cn: 魏京生在文化大革命期间参加了红卫兵，并在此过程中开始对江青等人产生怀疑。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wei Jingsheng joined the Red Guards, and in the process, began to harbor doubts about figures like Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 魏京生在安徽金寨看到大跃进时期饿死人的废墟后，认为毛泽东是刽子手，这深刻影响了他的政治观点。
description.en: After seeing the ruins left by the famine of the Great Leap Forward in Jinzhai, Anhui, Wei Jingsheng came to view Mao Zedong as a butcher, which profoundly shaped his political views.

description.zh-cn: 在安徽金寨看到大跃进饿死人的废墟后，认为毛泽东是刽子手。
description.en: After seeing the ruins from the Great Leap Forward famine in Jinzhai, Anhui, he considered Mao Zedong a butcher.

description.zh-cn: 在文革串联期间，开始对江青等人产生怀疑。
description.en: During the networking (chuanlian) phase of the Cultural Revolution, he began to have doubts about Jiang Qing and others.

description.zh-cn: 魏京生是西单民主墙运动中的重要一员，通过张贴大字报积极参与并推动了该运动。
description.en: Wei Jingsheng was a key member of the Xidan Democracy Wall movement, actively participating and advancing it by posting big-character posters.

description.zh-cn: 撰写并张贴了《第五个现代化：民主及其他》的大字报。
description.en: Authored and posted the big-character poster 'The Fifth Modernization: Democracy and Other Things'.

relationships.target: 要民主还是要新的独裁

description.zh-cn: 撰写并张贴了《要民主还是要新的独裁》的大字报。
description.en: Authored and posted the big-character poster 'Democracy or New Dictatorship'.

relationships.source: 要民主还是要新的独裁

description.zh-cn: 该大字报直言邓小平走的是独裁路线，是一名不折不扣的独裁者。
description.en: This big-character poster bluntly stated that Deng Xiaoping was taking a dictatorial path and was an out-and-out dictator.

description.zh-cn: 魏京生曾两度被中华人民共和国政府逮捕并判刑，累计服刑时间超过十八年。第一次因“反革命罪”被判刑15年，第二次因“阴谋颠覆政府罪”被判刑14年。
description.en: Wei Jingsheng was arrested and sentenced twice by the government of the People's Republic of China, serving a total of over eighteen years in prison. The first time for 'counter-revolutionary crimes' with a 15-year sentence, and the second time for 'conspiracy to subvert the government' with a 14-year sentence.

description.zh-cn: 以“保外就医”名义将魏京生直接押送机场，流放到美国。
description.en: Deported Wei Jingsheng directly to the airport under the pretext of 'medical parole' and exiled him to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 授予魏京生萨哈罗夫思想自由奖。
description.en: Awarded the Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought to Wei Jingsheng.

description.zh-cn: 授予魏京生民主奖。
description.en: Awarded the Democracy Award to Wei Jingsheng.

description.zh-cn: 与魏京生同获民主奖。
description.en: Received the Democracy Award along with Wei Jingsheng.

description.zh-cn: 魏京生在克林顿1998年访华前的“人质外交”操作中获释流亡，其释放被视为中国向美国示好的姿态。
description.en: Wei Jingsheng was released and exiled in a 'hostage diplomacy' maneuver before Clinton's 1998 visit to China; his release was seen as a gesture of goodwill from China to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 在魏京生流亡美国后，为其提供了办公室、公寓等设备以支持其研究。
description.en: After Wei Jingsheng went into exile in the U.S., the university provided him with an office, apartment, and other facilities to support his research.

description.zh-cn: 因认为魏京生的建议不切实际且学术研究无建树，中止了对他的赞助。
description.en: Terminated its sponsorship of Wei Jingsheng, deeming his proposals impractical and his academic research unproductive.

relationships.target: 中国民主运动海外联席会议

description.zh-cn: 在2009年南希·佩洛西出访中国大陆前探讨过这次访问。
description.en: Discussed Nancy Pelosi's 2009 visit to mainland China with her before she went.

description.zh-cn: 向南希·佩洛西颁发“魏京生民主人权终身奖”。
description.en: Presented the 'Wei Jingsheng Chinese Democracy Champion Award' to Nancy Pelosi.

description.zh-cn: 在刘晓波获得诺贝尔和平奖后，批评该奖项的决定，认为其他异议人士更应获奖。
description.en: After Liu Xiaobo won the Nobel Peace Prize, he criticized the decision, stating that other dissidents were more deserving.

description.zh-cn: 在其《共产中国与自由世界的未来》演讲中点名提及并肯定了魏京生。
description.en: Mentioned and acknowledged Wei Jingsheng by name in his speech 'Communist China and the Free World's Future'.

description.zh-cn: 以人身伤害为由在美国哥伦比亚特区高等法院起诉魏京生。
description.en: Sued Wei Jingsheng in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia for personal injury.

description.zh-cn: 称呼魏京生为“民主斗士”。
description.en: Called Wei Jingsheng a 'democracy fighter'.

description.zh-cn: 称呼魏京生为“民主先锋”。
description.en: Called Wei Jingsheng a 'pioneer of democracy'.

description.zh-cn: 在其2011年《从魏京生到刘晓波》一文中对魏京生的勇气、智慧与尊严推崇备至。
description.en: In his 2011 article 'From Wei Jingsheng to Liu Xiaobo', he highly praised Wei Jingsheng's courage, wisdom, and dignity.

description.zh-cn: 发表文章批判魏京生，称其为“青年的败类”并支持法院对他的判决。
description.en: Published an article criticizing Wei Jingsheng, calling him the 'scum of the youth' and supporting the court's verdict against him.

description.zh-cn: 支持俄罗斯对乌克兰发动的战争，认为这是普京“为保护本民族不再遭受种族清洗”。
description.en: Supports Russia's war against Ukraine, believing it is Putin's way 'to protect his own nation from ethnic cleansing'.

description.zh-cn: 支持俄罗斯对乌克兰发动的战争，并称乌克兰“自身不干净”。
description.en: Supports Russia's war against Ukraine and claimed that Ukraine 'is not clean itself'.
